message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $12,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $16,000. This product is truly top-of-the-line and will exceed your expectations.
Hi Alice, I understand that the product is top-of-the-line, but $16,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. Can you consider this offer?
